title: Pork Chops with Spiced Sweet Potatoes and Apples
directions: Sprinkle pork with salt and pepper. Heat oil in heavy large skillet over medium-high heat. Add pork; sauté until brown, about 3 minutes per side. Transfer pork to plate. Add potato and onion to skillet. Reduce heat to medium; sauté until onion is golden, about 7 minutes. Mix in apple and cinnamon; season with salt and pepper. Nestle pork among vegetables. Pour in broth; bring to boil. Cover, reduce heat and simmer until pork and vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes.
ingredients: 1 8-ounce red-skinned sweet potato (yam), peeled, thinly sliced
1 large unpeeled apple, halved, cored, thickly sliced
